alert.note: Alert for Louisa; Muscatine (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 3:47AM CDT until further notice by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Illinois... Mississippi River from Dubuque downstream to Burlington Iowa, affecting all counties bordering the Mississippi River. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Muscatine. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.5 feet, Water affects Mississippi Drive at Mulberry Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to 20.4 feet Wednesday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
